Lafayette.Billeaud House:
The Billeaud House in Broussard, Louisiana, located at 303 W. Main St., was built in about 1907. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983.

It is one of 10 individually NRHP-listed houses in the "Broussard Multiple Resource Area", which also includes:
Alesia House
Martial Billeaud Jr.
